lead_paragraph: As part of a criminal investigation, a court froze the assets of five prominent activists and three nongovernmental organizations that document state abuses.

byline.contributor: Declan Walsh contributed reporting from Houston.

headline.print_headline: Egypt Freezes the Assets of Rights Advocates
headline.main: Egypt Freezes Assets of Several Human Rights Advocates

snippet: As part of a criminal investigation, a court froze the assets of five prominent activists and three nongovernmental organizations that document state abuses....

keywords.value: Human Rights and Human Rights Violations
